1.12.2.1.12.2-1.1.0:
recipe for exploding jack-o'-lantern can now take up to 4 gunpowder,
exploding jack-o'-lanterns without proper nbt tags now get a tooltip with crafting info,
slime balls can now be used as a crafting ingredient to make jack-o'-lanterns bouncy,
spelling of 'Jack o'Lantern' is now consistent with the spelling used by minecraft
1.12.2.1.12.2-1.2.0:
added JEI support,
added better particles,
made some minor changes to projectile behaviour
1.12.2.1.12.2-1.3.0:
fireworks can now be used in the exploding jack o'lantern recipe to remove gravity from the projectile, set a maximum flight time before exploding, and optionally adding particle effects,
fixed a few desynchronisation issues,
renamed 'Bounce' to 'Bounce:'
1.12.2.1.12.2-1.4.0:
splash- & lingering potions can now be used in the exploding jack o'lantern recipe to add effects to exploding jack o'lanterns,
added french translation (by pyrofab),
increased amount of exploding jack o'lanterns obtained from crafting to 2,
fixed exploding jack o'lanterns being uncraftable with fireworks without nbt
1.12.2.1.12.2-1.5.0:
jack o'launchers can now be enchanted and have durability,
added 'reloading', 'blast shield' and 'unwasting' enchantments,
fixed JEI potion recipes,
any pumpkin can now be used for crafting,
added various translations
1.12.2.1.12.2-1.5.1:
added enchantment descriptions,
replaced power enchant with custom 'launching' enchant,
fixed blast shield enchant being inverted
1.12.2.1.12.2-1.6.0:
iron nuggets, arrows, ender pearls and bone blocks can now be used in crafting,
increased crafted ammo from 2 to 3,
increased maximum gunpowder and decreased explosion power
1.12.2.1.12.2-1.6.1:
looting can now be applied to the jack o'launcher,
added JEI support for arrows
1.12.2.1.12.2-1.6.2:
renamed 'exploding jack o'lantern' to 'jack o'launcher ammo',
fixed enchantment glint on jack o'launcher,
overhauled textures,
recipes with wool now require at least 1 gunpowder,
fixed tooltips for exploding jack o'lanterns with potion effects,
fixed a crash in worlds with exploding jack o'launcher entities generated before 1.6.0
1.12.2.1.12.2-1.6.3:
added proper support for modded arrows,
fixed launching increasing inaccuracy instead of velocity,
slightly increased launching effectiveness,
decreased inaccuracy
1.12.2.1.12.2-1.7.0:
backported new jack o'launcher model,
backported new jack o'projectile rendering,
minor fixes

1.13.2.1.13.2-0.1.1:
fixed arrows,
fixed potion effect trail colors,
added tooltips
1.13.2.1.13.2-0.1.2:
overhauled jack o'launcher textures,
overhauled jack o'projectile rendering,
slightly tweaked jack o'projectile physics
1.13.2.1.13.2-0.1.3:
added a bunch of translations,
added impact death messages,
added jack o'projectile variants,
added a particle texture,
fixed jack o'projectiles not dealing impact damage on players,
fixed update.json,
various other tweaks and fixes
1.13.2.1.13.2-1.0.0:
Added jei support,
fixed recipe output for jack o'launcher ammo,
jack o'launcher ammo now displays its texture/modelf,
fixed jack o'projectile spawning too high,
slightly reduced jack o'projectile bounding box size

1.14.4.1.14.4-0.1.0:
ported to 1.14.4,
overhauled jack o'ammo texture
1.14.4.1.14.4-1.0.0:
reduced maximum amount of bounces to 1 due to inconsistent bounce behaviour,
launching enchantment now also increases accuracy
